item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "When you're struggling with something, look at all the people around you and realize that every single person you see is struggling with something, and to them, it's just as hard as what you're going through." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Nothing that’s worthwhile is ever easy. Remember that." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I have faith that God will show you the answer. But you have to understand that sometimes it takes a while to be able to recognize what God wants you to do. That's how it often is. God's voice is usually nothing more than a whisper, and you have to listen very carefully to hear it. But other times, in those rarest of moments, the answer is obvious and rings as loud as a church bell." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "People come, people go – they’ll drift in and out of your life, almost like characters in a favorite book. When you finally close the cover, the characters have told their story and you start up again with another book, complete with new characters and adventures. Then you find yourself focusing on the new ones, not the ones from the past." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "It happens to everyone as they grow up. You find out who you are and what you want, and then you realize that people you've known forever don't see things the way you do. So you keep the wonderful memories, but find yourself moving on." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by sitta karina
item.description: "la amistad es la raíz del amor puro. el amor puro es la fuente de la felicidad." -- sitta karina

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by sitta karina
Fransiska add a quote by Nalini Singh
item.description: "You do realize this makes your wings even more unique." "Are you saying you shot me as a cosmetic procedure?" -- Nalini Singh

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "How do you feel, Georgie?" whispered Mrs. Weasley. George's fingers groped for the side of his head. "Saintlike," he murmured. "What's wrong with him?" croaked Fred, looking terrified. "Is his mind affected?" "Saintlike," repeated George, opening his eyes and looking up at his brother. "You see...I'm HOLEY, Fred, geddit?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Ika Natassa
item.description: "Menjadi orang dewasa berarti berani menghadapi perasaan sendiri dan menjalani resikonya.." -- Ika Natassa

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Simone Elkeles
item.description: "I want to try making things right because picking up the pieces is way better than leaving them the way they are." -- Simone Elkeles

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Fransiska add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Destroying things is much easier than making them." -- Suzanne Collins
